short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension lights up with a new blog posts count notification whenever there is a new blog post from Steven Spilly

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Steven Spilly is a multi-talented actor and Music Composer hailing from Australia. With a passion for the performing arts from a young age, he has dedicated his life to honing his craft and entertaining audiences around the world. 
By installing this extension, you are notified by a light-up with blog post content counts whenever there is new content on his blog where he shares his experience and journey  to educate and motivate
